name: zwieback
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of bread that is sliced and made crisp (= hard enough to break): She has started to make her own zwieback by baking a loaf, slicing it, and then baking those slices again so they go crisp. I've been enjoying cream cheese and smoked salmon on zwieback crackers. Put the crushed zweibacks and butter in a pan.
More examplesFewer examplesThey used crushed zwieback to make the coating for the fish fillets.He made croutons to go with the soup from zwieback broken into rough cubes.It has been common to give teething babies zwieback toasts for many years.
